title: Buying - N172 OJ - beaters - skinned / trimmed
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: Buying - N172 OJ - beaters - skinned / trimmed
posts.post_content:
As the title says, I’m open to buying real beater Old Judges, skinned and / or trimmed is fine, just needs to be priced right.

Please let me know what you have available!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Got a few of these from board members, open to any others that may be available!
